name: div
features: RA13 Inspired : Designed to reflect Ronald Acuña Jr.’s energy and rise to stardom
Impact Protection : Hard, lightweight shell helps absorb impact from wild pitches
Mobility : Low-profile design allows for natural movement at the plate
Moisture Management : Nike Dri-FIT technology wicks away sweat to keep you dry & comfortable
Custom Fit : Adjustable single strap with hook-and-loop closure for a secure, personalized fit
Materials : 66% polyethylene / 15% polyester / 11% ethylene vinyl acetate / 4% rubber / 4% polyurethane
